title: No results if searched via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed. However, searching via the context menu in the Packages view works as expected.
OB: The Search dialog in the package view initializes with the fully qualified name, but when searching for declarations, it does not find any results.
EB: When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog, the search should first attempt to get the Java element. If that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Select a package.
3. Open the Search dialog.
4. Enter a search term for declarations.
5. Click the search button.
6. Verify that no results are displayed.
7. Right-click on the package in the Packages view.
8. Select the search option from the context menu.
9. Enter the same search term for declarations.
10. Click the search button.
11. Verify that results are displayed correctly.
